findings.rationale: The obligations under this Agreement continue in perpetuity, which may result in indefinite liability and lack of clarity on when obligations cease.
findings.evidence_quote: The obligations under this Agreement shall continue in perpetuity and shall survive any termination of discussions between the parties.

findings.rationale: The limitation of liability clause indicates that neither party's liability is limited, exposing both parties to potentially significant financial risk.
findings.evidence_quote: Notwithstanding any other provision, neither party's liability shall be limited under this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Indemnification clauses without limits can expose a party to unforeseen expenses and liabilities without a cap.
findings.evidence_quote: Each party shall indemnify and hold harmless the other party from and against all claims, losses, damages, and expenses, without limit, arising out of any breach of this Agreement.

findings.rationale: Exclusive ownership of work product by one party may pose a risk to the other party's rights to use the results of collaboration.
findings.evidence_quote: All work product and deliverables created hereunder shall be owned exclusively by Company A.
